sections.general:
GUEST TEACHER
Professional Overview
A detail - oriented, high energy Social Science Teacher with the ability to motivate students to work at optimum levels while maintaining a
comfortable, creative environment, and keeping a clear perspective of goals to be accomplished. Experience in helping students broaden
perspectives through aligning subject matter to present day experience and events.
Core Qualifications
Creative lesson planning Differentiated learning
Excellent relationship building skills Positive and encouraging
Experiential learning Able to work independently and as a member of a team
Interpersonal, oral, and written communication skills Curriculum lesson plan development
Accomplishments
Secondary 7-12 Social Studies.
Issued: 11/17/15.
